mapper.select: select l.lesson_no,c.calculate_no, o.orderlist_calculatestatus, c.calculate_date, o.member_id, o.orderlist_date, o.orderlist_orderstatus,s.senior_nick from calculate c right join lesson l on c.lesson_no=l.lesson_no join order_detail od on l.lesson_no =od.lesson_no join orderlist o on od.orderlist_no=o.orderlist_no join senior s on l.senior_no=s.senior_no where o.orderlist_calculatestatus=3 or o.orderlist_calculatestatus=4 group by o.orderlist_calculatestatus,o.orderlist_date, l.lesson_no order by orderlist_date desc

select sum(orderlist_cost) as orderlist_cost from orderlist o join order_detail od on od.orderlist_no=o.orderlist_no join lesson l on od.lesson_no=l.lesson_no join senior s on l.senior_no=s.senior_no join member m on m.member_id=o.member_id where o.orderlist_calculatestatus=3 or o.orderlist_calculatestatus=4 group by o.orderlist_calculatestatus,o.orderlist_date, l.lesson_no order by orderlist_date desc

select sum(orderlist_usepoint) as orderlist_usepoint from orderlist o join order_detail od on od.orderlist_no=o.orderlist_no join lesson l on od.lesson_no=l.lesson_no join senior s on l.senior_no=s.senior_no join member m on m.member_id=o.member_id where o.orderlist_calculatestatus=3 or o.orderlist_calculatestatus=4 group by o.orderlist_calculatestatus,o.orderlist_date, l.lesson_no order by orderlist_date desc

select floor(sum(orderlist_cost-(orderlist_usepoint+(orderlist_cost*0.1)))) as calculate_cost_nosurtax , floor(sum(orderlist_cost-(orderlist_usepoint+(orderlist_cost*0.1)+((orderlist_cost/1.1)*0.1)))) as calculate_cost_surtax , floor(sum(orderlist_cost*0.1)) as calculate_comm , floor(sum((orderlist_cost/1.1)*0.1)) as calculate_surtax from orderlist o join order_detail od on od.orderlist_no=o.orderlist_no join lesson l on od.lesson_no=l.lesson_no join senior s on l.senior_no=s.senior_no join member m on m.member_id=o.member_id where o.orderlist_calculatestatus=3 or o.orderlist_calculatestatus=4 group by o.orderlist_calculatestatus,o.orderlist_date, l.lesson_no order by orderlist_date desc

select calculate_date, calculate_bank_name, calculate_account_name, calculate_account_num, calculate_crno, calculate_no from calculate c right join lesson l on c.lesson_no=l.lesson_no group by l.lesson_no union select calculate_date, calculate_bank_name, calculate_account_name, calculate_account_num, calculate_crno, calculate_no from calculate c left join lesson l on c.lesson_no=l.lesson_no group by l.lesson_no order by calculate_date desc
mapper.update: update orderlist set orderlist_calculatestatus=3 where orderlist_calculatestatus=4
